name: portnote
description: PortNote is a self-hosted password manager with note encryption. It stores sensitive notes securely via browser with categories, search, and a clean UI for personal use.
features: Encrypted storage: Store sensitive notes and passwords with client-side encryption for maximum security.
Category organization: Organize notes into custom categories for structured information management.
Search functionality: Quickly find notes and passwords using full-text search across all entries.
Password generation: Generate strong, random passwords with customizable length and character requirements.
Browser-based access: Access your encrypted notes from any device through a web browser interface.
Export and backup: Export notes and passwords for backup or migration to other systems.
Clean interface: Minimal, distraction-free UI focuses on quick note access and password retrieval.
Multi-user support: Create separate accounts for different users with isolated encrypted storage.
Auto-lock feature: Automatically lock the interface after inactivity to protect sensitive information.
Secure sharing: Share specific notes with other users while maintaining encryption and access control.
Audit logging: Track access and modifications to sensitive notes for security monitoring.
Mobile responsive: Optimized interface works seamlessly on smartphones and tablets.
